property.name: enable.unrecoverable.reset
property.description: Determines if resetting CDAP should be enabled. **WARNING: Enabling this option makes it possible to delete all applications and data; NO RECOVERY IS POSSIBLE!**

property.name: bootstrap.file
property.description: File that contains bootstrap steps that should be executed on a new CDAP instance as well as steps that should be executed on every restart of CDAP. Bootstrap steps include operations like loading system artifacts, creating the native profile, and creating the data prep application.

property.name: system.app.config.dir
property.description: Directory that contains definitions for what system apps should be running. This directory is continuously monitored for new/modified config files and updating application state to match what is defined in those files.

property.name: app.artifact.dir
property.description: Semicolon-separated list of local directories scanned for system artifacts to add to the artifact repository

property.name: app.program.runtime.extensions.dir
property.description: Semicolon-separated list of local directories that are scanned for program runtime extensions

property.name: app.program.spark.compat
property.description: Spark compatibility version. Must be 'spark1_2.10' or 'spark2_2.11'. This is only used in CDAP Local Sandbox mode. In Distributed CDAP mode, the Spark version will be automatically detected.

property.name: enable.preview
property.description: Determines if preview should be enabled.

property.name: preview.cache.size
property.description: Number of preview runs for which data will be stored in memory. When size exceeds, data for the oldest run will be removed from memory and no longer retrievable.

property.name: data.local.storage.blocksize
property.description: Block size in bytes for data fabric when in CDAP Local Sandbox

property.name: data.local.storage.cachesize
property.description: Cache size in bytes for data fabric when in CDAP Local Sandbox

property.name: log.base.dir
property.description: Base log directory

property.name: log.process.pipeline.config.dir
property.description: A local directory on the CDAP Master that is scanned for log processing pipeline configurations. Each pipeline is defined by a file in the logback XML format, with ".xml" as the file name extension.

property.name: log.process.pipeline.event.delay.ms
property.description: The time a log event stays in the log processing pipeline buffer before writing out to log appenders in milliseconds. A longer delay will result in less frequent flush to disk but longer for logs to be available.

property.name: log.process.pipeline.lib.dir
property.description: Semicolon-separated list of local directories on the CDAP Master scanned for additional library JAR files to be included for log processing

property.name: log.pipeline.cdap.file.permissions
property.description: We don't want to use set permissions in CDAP Local Sandbox, as posix permissions are not supported on the Windows FS.

property.name: log.pipeline.cdap.dir.permissions
property.description: We don't want to use set permissions in CDAP Local Sandbox, as posix permissions are not supported on the Windows FS.

property.name: metrics.data.table.retention.minimum.resolution.seconds
property.description: Retention resolution in seconds of the minimum resolution table; default retention period is 2 hours

property.name: operational.stats.extensions.dir
property.description: Semicolon-separated list of local directories on the CDAP Master that are scanned for operational statistics extensions

property.name: runtime.extensions.dir
property.description: Semicolon-separated list of local directories on the CDAP Master that are scanned for program runtime extensions

property.name: data.tx.prune.enable
property.description: Disable invalid list transaction pruning

property.name: router.address
property.description: CDAP Router service address to which CDAP UI connects (deprecated; use router.server.address directly)

property.name: router.bind.address
property.description: CDAP Router service bind address

property.name: router.server.address
property.description: CDAP Router service address to which CDAP UI connects

property.name: kerberos.auth.enabled
property.description: Determines if Kerberos authentication is enabled

property.name: security.store.provider
property.description: The secure store provider that defines the actual storage system backing the CDAP secure store APIs. Secure store APIs are used to write or look up sensitive information, such as password. It is also used to evaluate secure macros identified by ${secure(my-key)}. The value can be 'file' or name of the extension to be used for storing sensitive data.

property.name: security.store.extensions.dir
property.description: Semicolon-separated list of local directories that are scanned for secure store extensions

property.name: app.program.log.appender.extensions.dir
property.description: Directory for log appender jars

property.name: ui.feature.cdc
property.description: Enables the experimental Delta Replicator UI

property.name: delta.default.checkpoint.directory
property.description: Default path to store replicator state and offsets
